vague_description: The client needs to determine the optimal number of fruit packs to consume in order to meet nutritional requirements while adhering to a specific ratio and minimizing sugar intake.
detailed_description: A dietician recommends her client eat blueberries and strawberries to meet her anti-oxidant and mineral requirement. A pack of blueberries contains \param{BlueberryAntioxidants} units of anti-oxidants and \param{BlueberryMinerals} units of minerals. A pack of strawberries contains \param{StrawberryAntioxidants} unit of anti-oxidants and \param{StrawberryMinerals} units of minerals. The client must get at least \param{MinAntioxidants} units of anti-oxidants and \param{MinMinerals} units of minerals. In addition, because blueberries are not in season, the dietician recommends she eats at least 3 times as many packs of strawberries as blueberries. This is expressed as a strawberry to blueberry ratio of \param{StrawberryBlueberryRatio}. If a pack of blueberries contains \param{BlueberrySugar} grams of sugar and a pack of strawberries contains \param{StrawberrySugar} grams of sugar, how many of packs of each should she consume to minimize her sugar intake?
target_objective: Minimize the total sugar intake from consuming packs of blueberries and strawberries
target_constraints: Number of blueberry packs is non-negative
Number of strawberry packs is non-negative
Total anti-oxidants from blueberries and strawberries must be at least MinAntioxidants
Total minerals from blueberries and strawberries must be at least MinMinerals
Number of strawberry packs must be at least 3 times the number of blueberry packs
target_parameters: Units of anti-oxidants in a pack of blueberries
Units of minerals in a pack of blueberries
Units of anti-oxidants in a pack of strawberries
Units of minerals in a pack of strawberries
Ratio of packs of strawberries to blueberries
Grams of sugar in a pack of blueberries
Grams of sugar in a pack of strawberries
